statements: SELECT full_name, age, sport FROM athlete_profiles WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT full_name, weight, sport FROM athlete_profiles WHERE age > 25;
SELECT full_name, gender, progress_assessment FROM athlete_profiles WHERE sport = 'Running';
SELECT full_name, height FROM athlete_profiles WHERE weight > 70 AND goal_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT athlete_id, full_name, gender FROM athlete_profiles WHERE age < 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM athlete_profiles WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT athlete_id, full_name, sport FROM athlete_profiles WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age;
SELECT full_name, age, weight FROM athlete_profiles WHERE sport = 'Swimming' ORDER BY weight DESC, age ASC;
SELECT * FROM athlete_profiles WHERE goal_description LIKE '%strength%' AND progress_assessment IS NOT NULL;
SELECT athlete_id, full_name, sport, height FROM athlete_profiles WHERE age < 30 AND weight >= 70 ORDER BY height DESC;
SELECT * FROM AthleteProfiles;
SELECT name, height, weight FROM AthleteProfiles WHERE height > 180;
SELECT athlete_id, birthdate FROM AthleteProfiles ORDER BY birthdate DESC;
SELECT name, weight_progress FROM AthleteProfiles JOIN ProgressAssessments ON AthleteProfiles.athlete_id = ProgressAssessments.athlete_id WHERE ProgressAssessments.endurance_progress > 10;
SELECT athlete_id, assessment_date, strength_progress FROM ProgressAssessments WHERE strength_progress < 5;
SELECT athlete_id, name, birthdate FROM AthleteProfiles WHERE height > 180 ORDER BY birthdate DESC;
SELECT athlete_id, name, weight, birthdate FROM AthleteProfiles WHERE birthdate BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '1995-01-01' ORDER BY weight ASC;
SELECT athlete_id, weight_progress, endurance_progress FROM ProgressAssessments WHERE endurance_progress > 5 ORDER BY weight_progress DESC;

SELECT * FROM AthleteProfiles INNER JOIN ProgressAssessments ON AthleteProfiles.athlete_id = ProgressAssessments.athlete_id WHERE AthleteProfiles.weight > 70 AND ProgressAssessments.endurance_progress < 10;
SELECT athlete_id, strength_progress FROM ProgressAssessments WHERE athlete_id IN (SELECT athlete_id FROM AthleteProfiles WHERE height < 170) ORDER BY strength_progress ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT full_name, age, sport FROM athlete_profiles;
SELECT id, goal, deadline FROM goals WHERE athlete_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM athlete_profiles ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT full_name, weight FROM athlete_profiles WHERE sport = 'Basketball';
SELECT id, assessment_date, assessment_result FROM progress_assessments ORDER BY assessment_date;
SELECT id, full_name, height, weight FROM athlete_profiles;
SELECT full_name, age, sport FROM athlete_profiles WHERE age > 25;
SELECT * FROM goals WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY athlete_id DESC;
SELECT athlete_id, assessment_date, assessment_result FROM progress_assessments JOIN athlete_profiles ON progress_assessments.athlete_id = athlete_profiles.id WHERE age > 30;

SELECT athlete_profiles.full_name, goals.goal, progress_assessments.assessment_result FROM athlete_profiles JOIN goals ON athlete_profiles.id = goals.athlete_id JOIN progress_assessments ON athlete_profiles.id = progress_assessments.athlete_id;
SELECT * FROM athletes;
SELECT athlete_id, name, age FROM athletes ORDER BY age;
SELECT goal_description, deadline FROM goals WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT athlete_id, bio FROM profiles JOIN athletes ON profiles.athlete_id = athletes.athlete_id;
SELECT MAX(height) AS max_height FROM athletes;
SELECT * FROM athletes WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY height DESC, weight ASC
SELECT a.name, p.bio FROM athletes a JOIN profiles p ON a.athlete_id = p.athlete_id WHERE a.age <= 30 AND p.photo_url IS NOT NULL
SELECT a.name, g.goal_description, g.deadline FROM athletes a JOIN goals g ON a.athlete_id = g.athlete_id WHERE g.deadline >= CURRENT_DATE ORDER BY g.deadline ASC
SELECT a.name, COUNT(g.goal_id) AS total_goals FROM athletes a LEFT JOIN goals g ON a.athlete_id = g.athlete_id GROUP BY a.name ORDER BY total_goals DESC

SELECT a.name, MIN(p.date) AS earliest_progress_date FROM athletes a JOIN goals g ON a.athlete_id = g.athlete_id JOIN progress p ON g.goal_id = p.goal_id GROUP BY a.name ORDER BY earliest_progress_date ASC
SELECT * FROM athlete_profiles;
SELECT athlete_id, firstname, dob FROM athlete_profiles WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT lastname, height, weight FROM athlete_profiles ORDER BY height DESC;
SELECT * FROM goals WHERE achieved = TRUE;
SELECT athlete_id, MAX(record_value) AS highest_record_value FROM personal_records GROUP BY athlete_id;
SELECT * FROM athlete_profiles ORDER BY lastname ASC, firstname DESC;
SELECT athlete_id, firstname, lastname, dob, height, weight FROM athlete_profiles WHERE height > 170 AND weight < 80;
SELECT athlete_id, firstname, lastname, target_date FROM goals JOIN athlete_profiles ON goals.athlete_id = athlete_profiles.athlete_id WHERE achieved = FALSE;

SELECT training_sessions.session_id, training_sessions.session_date, training_sessions.duration_minutes, athlete_profiles.firstname, athlete_profiles.lastname FROM training_sessions JOIN athlete_profiles ON training_sessions.athlete_id = athlete_profiles.athlete_id WHERE trainer_name = 'John Doe';

SELECT athlete_profiles.firstname, athlete_profiles.lastname, personal_records.record_name, personal_records.record_value, personal_records.record_date FROM athlete_profiles JOIN personal_records ON athlete_profiles.athlete_id = personal_records.athlete_id WHERE personal_records.record_value > 100 ORDER BY personal_records.record_value DESC, personal_records.record_date ASC;
